articles.title: KKK 12: Shoot Begins - India Today
articles.description: Rohit Shetty along with the contestants have commenced the shoot of Khatron Ke Khiladi 12. This year, the reality show is being shot at Cape Town, South Africa.
articles.content: Mohit Malik joined the KKK 12 contestants a little later, as he was busy shooting for his web series.
